productDescription:
The Akeru Hoody is a unique and limited edition piece made from 100% Organic
Cotton, ensuring both style and sustainability. The production process is
powered by 100% Wind Energy, aligning with our commitment to eco-conscious
manufacturing.

Origins:
The design for the Akeru Hoody was conceived in 2009 during a stay in
Sakinaka, Mumbai. The name "Akeru" is derived from "Sakina," which means
"blooming greens" in Japanese. This coincidental connection to Japanese
culture inspired a creative vision that evolved into the distinctive design of this
hoody.

Limited Edition:
With only 500 units available worldwide, the Akeru Hoody is a collector's item. Of
these, 150 are patched with vibrant red accents, 150 feature mustard yellow
patches, and 200 are in sleek black. Each hoody is individually numbered with a
unique identifier.

Functional Features:
• Hidden Pockets: The Akeru Hoody boasts versatile hidden pockets, including
one with a capacity of up to 30 liters.
• Special Solar Plexus Pocket: Designed for versatility, this unique pocket is
strategically placed on the solar plexus and serves various purposes.
• Built-in Mask/Scarf: The hoody includes a built-in mask that can also be used
as a scarf for added convenience.
• Innovative Drawstring: The drawstring mechanism comes with eyelets and
can be neatly tucked away inside the main pocket.

Designed for Performance:
The Akeru Hoody is specifically crafted for cold weather conditions and
increased mobility, making it an excellent choice for winter athleisure. Whether
you're into sports or simply seeking comfort during the chilly season, this hoody
combines functionality and style.
